item.title: Jo add a quote by J.A. Johnstone
Jo add a quote by William Johnstone
item.description: "It has been said that it's hard to stop a man who knows he's in the right and just keeps on coming. Smoke knew he was right - and he kept on coming." -- William Johnstone

item.title: Jo add a quote by William Johnstone
item.description: "He that lies with the dogs, riseth with the fleas." -- William Johnstone
